home_page.title: Home Page
home_page.content: Welcome to the home page of the application. You can see the latest suggestions and add your own suggestions.

board.title_1: This app helps you to keep your motivation high.
board.title_3: Begin a new day with a new suggestion.
board.description_1: You can add a new suggestion every day and keep your motivation high.
board.description_2: All day long, you can see the suggestions of other users and add your own suggestions.
board.description_3: You can add a new suggestion every day and keep your motivation high.
